game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Find the ancient temple hidden deep in the jungle.
game.description: Rumors have surfaced of a long-abandoned temple hidden somewhere in the dense jungle. The temple is said to contain powerful artifacts, but it's guarded by deadly traps and puzzles.
game.reward: A Golden Idol and 100 gold pieces

task.description: Make your way through the dense underbrush to reach the entrance of the jungle. Be cautious, as the terrain can be treacherous.

task.objective: Solve the puzzle of the ancient door
task.description: Use your wits to solve the complex puzzle that unlocks the entrance to the temple.
Navigate through the treacherous traps and puzzles within the temple to reach the chamber containing the Golden Idol.
